# Reasearch question
 The consumption of food is broken up into 11 different staple groups per country. but the amount consumed varies heavly based on location. For example in Argentina the average person consumes 8.77 kilograms of rice a year but in Bangladesh its 171.73 kilograms a year. The data really shows that food consumption is based in location for many staples.
